references.reason: This paper introduces a self-training method that has been shown to be effective in reasoning tasks and is a core idea of this study.

references.paper_title: Direct preference optimization: Your language model is secretly a reward model
references.reason: This paper introduces direct preference optimization, which is one of the loss functions in experiment of this study.

references.paper_title: KTO: Model alignment as prospect theoretic optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces KTO, which is used as the third loss function for evaluating the experiments.

references.paper_title: Measuring mathematical problem solving with the math dataset
references.reason: This paper introduces the MATH dataset, which is one of the datasets on which the approach is evaluated.

references.paper_title: Training verifiers to solve math word problems
references.reason: This paper introduces GSM8K dataset, one of the datasets on which the approach is evaluated.
